column4: Does anyone know how to fix this login error "could not update iceauthority"
It just happened out of the blue
check the forums.
that was a problem for people who encrypted home directory. http://ubuntuforums.org/ or launchpad will have into
ebuntu: odd.
I didnt encrypt the home directory, well anything
you choose an option on install. you sure?
Yes completely
how old is install?
ebuntu sorry. I would find out if wlan card is supported.
Since 10.04 released
did you run ubuntu before that?
Did a clean install
ice authority has bugs but I thought they were put to rest in lucid. I would check the forums.
What is ice authority anyway?
Are openbsd people pretty friendly?
has to do with passwords and security. It was a nightmare for me.
tyler: good idea. I've heard things.
Is it default in the installation or it comes with other packages?
default
btw thanks for you help
tyler but I will
good luck you will get it.
